ygData.subject: LotR MMORPG...
ygData.msgSnippet: ... You re talking about the guys who own the rights to produce a game based on the book. But, just to show how stupid intellectual monopoly laws are, there is
ygData.messageBody:
--- Daniel Sniderman <fuzzbone@...> wrote:
> There are several in the works now. Shadowbane I believe is very close.
> Lord of the Rings is far from - if it will ever - be released. The company
> that holds the long term development (I think it's Sierra owned by EA) has
> wasted three years. - laying off the entire development team and trying to
> start again.

You're talking about the guys who own the rights to produce a game based on
the book.

But, just to show how stupid intellectual monopoly laws are, there is a whole
separate company who has the rights to produce a game based on the /movie/.
That company, whose name I forget, is /also/ producing a Massive Multiplayer
persistent world Lord of the Rings game. I don't know how far along they are,
but they're not the same company.
